metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a literature review of the document’s contributions

subsection_analysis.refined_text: You’ll join a small, highly skilled team pushing the boundaries of AI, mobile systems, and security. At EnfoldAI, we’re building the next-generation, consumer-first network of mobile AI agents that detect security threats in real-time.
Excited to build the future of financial cybersecurity? We’d love to hear from you!

○​ Architect and implement APIs, data pipelines, and auth flows that bridge mobile agents with financial- and law-enforcement systems ○​ Enforce encryption, access control, and audit logging at every layer ●​ Research & Prototyping ○​ Investigate cutting-edge fraud-detection algorithms and build rapid proofs-of-concept ○​ Collaborate with data scientists to turn models into production-grade features
○​ Optimize and deploy lightweight ML models on Android/iOS agents ○​ Work with TensorFlow Lite, Core ML, or custom inference engines

●​ Coursework or side projects in mobile development, ML on edge devices, or cybersecurity​ ●​ Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)​ ●​ Open-source contributions or published research in related fields
